summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 7%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in pressure (down 5 mbar), light levels (up 4634 lux), and cloud levels (up 563 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1493 m), light levels (up 6930 lux), and rainfall (down 0.3 mm) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s cloud levels is 563.4m lower than yesterday, 1059.2m lower than past week, 1493.4m lower than past month.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 860m minimum and 3110m maximum, with an average of 1309.9m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 2370m and 2800m.
cloud levels.summary: The clouds will be high, plenty of sunshine is expected.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; warm but comfortable temperatures are expected. Also, the air will be thick and uncomfortable. Chance of light rain, the clouds will be high, plenty of sunshine is expected, and a mix of sun and clouds. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
